title: Giri Kana Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering, Australian
description: Opened July 2012, this is a vegetarian cafe that offers vegan options in peaceful atmosphere along the Southport Broadwater. Has breakfast, fresh juices, smoothies, locally roasted coffee, and cakes.
streetAddress: Shop 1 H2O Broadwater, 82 Marine Parade, Southport
